item.description: Lesson Plan Importance of project management for animation students What is a pipeline? Importance of project conventions. Style Guides for project management File formats Version control and backups Communication and working in a team Production Phases of a typical project

item.title: Scripting for Animation 2
item.description: This course is a little different because it’s for 2D animation students. However there is still a need to know or be somewhat familiar with technical aspects that are often involved in 2D animation.
